targets.expr: sum(rate(get_page_count_total{source_cluster="$source_cluster", service="layout-service", container="main"}[$__rate_interval])*60) by (page_name, platform, cohort_id, filters, proto_version, partner_type)

alert.message: Avg. p99 latency for layout service has been breaching the threshold value of 200ms for 5 mins now in ${source_cluster}
alert.name: Overall p99 Latency alert for Layout Service

alert.message: Layout service in ${source_cluster} has been throwing 5XX code for more than 0.01% of requests for 1 min now.
alert.name: Overall Throughput alert

targets.expr: min(sum(container_memory_rss{namespace="hs-core", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster", container="main", pod=~"layout-service.*", pod!~"layout-service-nginx.*"}) by (pod)/sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="hs-core", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster", container="main", pod=~"layout-service.*", pod!~"layout-service-nginx.*"}) by (pod))

avg(sum(container_memory_rss{namespace="hs-core", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster", container="main", pod=~"layout-service.*", pod!~"layout-service-nginx.*"}) by (pod)/sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="hs-core", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster", container="main", pod=~"layout-service.*", pod!~"layout-service-nginx.*"}) by (pod))

max(sum(container_memory_rss{namespace="hs-core", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster", container="main", pod=~"layout-service.*", pod!~"layout-service-nginx.*"}) by (pod)/sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="hs-core", source_cluster=~"$source_cluster", container="main", pod=~"layout-service.*", pod!~"layout-service-nginx.*"}) by (pod))

targets.expr: sum(rate(get_page_error_count_total{source_cluster="$source_cluster", service="layout-service"}[$__rate_interval])*60) by (page_name, platform, country, proto_version, partner_type, error_message)

sum(rate(get_page_instance_error_count_total{source_cluster="$source_cluster", service="layout-service"}[$__rate_interval])*60) by (page_name, platform, country, proto_version, partner_type, error_message)
sum(rate(get_widget_error_count_total{source_cluster="$source_cluster", service="layout-service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (page_id, space_id, widget_id, platform, proto_version, error_message)

panels.title: Get Widget Type Instance Info Errors

targets.expr: sum(rate(get_space_error_count_total{source_cluster="$source_cluster", service="layout-service"}[$__rate_interval])*60) by (page_id, space_id, platform, proto_version, filter_key, filter_value, next_offset, next_size, error_message)
